key.name: cmd-win-optsize
key.description: Resize the focused window to a size based on the monitor work area and center it.

key.name: cmd-win-mouseresize
key.description: Resize the focused window by holding Super+Shift and moving the mouse beyond the window edges.

key.name: win-optsize-config
key.description: JSON config for win_optsize breakpoints and scales.

key.name: win-mouseresize-border-color
key.description: CSS color used for the resize indicator border.

key.name: win-mouseresize-background-color
key.description: CSS color used for the resize indicator background.

key.name: win-mouseresize-border-size
key.description: Border size, in pixels, for the resize indicator.

key.name: keybinding-flags
key.description: Meta.KeyBindingFlags name or numeric value used for extension keybindings.

key.name: keybinding-actionmode
key.description: Shell.ActionMode name or numeric value used for extension keybindings.

key.name: override-conflicting-bindings
key.description: When enabled, automatically removes conflicting keybindings from other schemas and restores them when the extension is disabled. When disabled, commands with conflicting keybindings are skipped with a warning.
